default_args_override.description: Default arguments to use if not specified in function call.
default_args_override.title: Default Args Override

linlog.description: Whether to use 'symlog' scale or not. Defaults to False.
linlog.title: Linlog

linthresh.description: A single float which defines the range (-x, x), within which the plot is linear. This avoids having the plot go to infinity around zero. Defaults to 1.
linthresh.title: Linthresh

nr_of_data_svd_vectors.description: Number of data SVD vector to plot. Defaults to 4.
nr_of_data_svd_vectors.title: Nr Of Data Svd Vectors

nr_of_residual_svd_vectors.description: Number of residual SVD vector to plot. Defaults to 2.
nr_of_residual_svd_vectors.title: Nr Of Residual Svd Vectors

show_data_svd_legend.description: Whether or not to show the data SVD legend. Defaults to True.
show_data_svd_legend.title: Show Data Svd Legend

show_residual_svd_legend.description: Whether or not to show the residual SVD legend. Defaults to True.
show_residual_svd_legend.title: Show Residual Svd Legend

irf_location.description: Location of the ``irf`` by which the time axis will get shifted. If it is None the time axis will not be shifted. Defaults to None.
irf_location.title: Irf Location

use_svd_number.description: Whether to use singular value number (starts at 1) instead of singular value index (starts at 0) for labeling in plot. Defaults to False.
use_svd_number.title: Use Svd Number

indices.description: Indices of the singular vector to plot. Defaults to tuple(range(10)).
indices.title: Indices

show_legend.description: Whether or not to show the legend. Defaults to True.
show_legend.title: Show Legend

title.description: Title to add to the figure. Defaults to "Fit overview".
title.title: Title

figsize.description: Size of the figure (N, M) in inches. Defaults to (30, 15).
figsize.title: Figsize

cmap.description: Colormap to use for the filled contour plot. Defaults to "PuRd" which is most suitable for emission data (previous default was "viridis").
cmap.title: Cmap

vmin.description: Lower value to anchor the colormap. Defaults to None meaning it inferred from the data.
vmin.title: Vmin

vmax.description: Lower value to anchor the colormap. Defaults to None meaning it inferred from the data.
vmax.title: Vmax

linscale.description: This allows the linear range (-linthresh to linthresh) to be stretched relative to the logarithmic range. Its value is the number of decades to use for each half of the linear range. For example, when linscale == 1.0 (the default), the space used for the positive and negative halves of the linear range will be equal to one decade in the logarithmic range. Defaults to 1.
linscale.title: Linscale

main_irf_nr.description: Index of the main ``irf`` component when using an ``irf`` parametrized with multiple peaks. Defaults to 0.
main_irf_nr.title: Main Irf Nr

y_label.description: Label used for the y-axis of each subplot.
y_label.title: Y Label

show_data.description: Whether to show the input data or residual. If set to ``None`` the plot is skipped which improves plotting performance for big datasets. Defaults to False.
show_data.title: Show Data

show_irf_dispersion_center.description: Whether to show the the IRF dispersion center as overlay on the residual/data plot. Defaults to True.
show_irf_dispersion_center.title: Show Irf Dispersion Center

show_zero_line.description: Whether or not to add a horizontal line at zero. Defaults to True.
show_zero_line.title: Show Zero Line

center_λ.description: Center wavelength of the IRF (λ in nm).
center_λ.title: Center Λ

figure_only.description: Deprecated please remove this argument for you function calls. Defaults to None.
figure_only.title: Figure Only

time_range.description: Start and end time for the Oscillation plot, if ``main_irf_nr`` is not None the value are relative to the IRF location. Defaults to None which means that the full time range is used.
time_range.title: Time Range

spectral.description: Value of the spectral axis that should be used to select the data for the Oscillation plot this value does not need to be an exact existing value and only has effect if the IRF has dispersion. Defaults to 0 which means that the Oscillation plot at lowest spectral value will be shown.
spectral.title: Spectral

normalize.description: Whether or not to normalize the DOAS spectra plot. If the DOAS spectra is normalized, the Oscillation is scaled with the reciprocal of the normalization to compensate for this. Defaults to False.
normalize.title: Normalize

damped_oscillation.description: List of oscillation names which should be plotted. Defaults to None which means that all oscillations will be plotted.
damped_oscillation.title: Damped Oscillation

oscillation_type.description: Type of the oscillation to show in the oscillation plot. Defaults to "cos"
oscillation_type.title: Oscillation Type

legend_format_string.description: Format string for each entry in the legend of the oscillation plot. Possible values which can be replaced are ``label`` (label of the oscillation in the model definition), ``frequency`` (ν) and ``rate`` (γ). Use ``""`` to remove the legend. Defaults to ``r"{label}: $\nu$={frequency:.0f}, $\gamma$={rate:.1f}"``
legend_format_string.title: Legend Format String

divide_by_scale.description: Whether or not to divide the data by the dataset scale used for optimization. Defaults to True.
divide_by_scale.title: Divide By Scale

per_axis_legend.description: Whether to use a legend per plot or for the whole figure. Defaults to False.
per_axis_legend.title: Per Axis Legend

axes_shape.description: Shape of the plot grid (N, M). Defaults to (4, 4).
axes_shape.title: Axes Shape

PlotConfig.description: Config for plot functions including default args and label overrides.

general.description: Config that gets applied to all functions if not specified otherwise.

PlotConfig.title: PlotConfig

time_range.description: Start and end time for the IRF derivative plot. Defaults to None which means that the full time range is used.
time_range.title: Time Range

spectral.description: Value of the spectral axis that should be used to select the data for the IRF derivative plot this value does not need to be an exact existing value and only has effect if the IRF has dispersion. Defaults to 0 which means that the IRF derivative plot at lowest spectral value will be shown.
spectral.title: Spectral

main_irf_nr.description: Index of the main ``irf`` component when using an ``irf`` parametrized with multiple peaks and is used to shift the time axis. If it is none ``None`` the shifting will be deactivated. Defaults to 0.
main_irf_nr.title: Main Irf Nr

normalize.description: Whether or not to normalize the IRF derivative plot. If the IRF derivative is normalized, the IRFAS is scaled with the reciprocal of the normalization to compensate for this. Defaults to True.
normalize.title: Normalize

figsize.description: Size of the figure (N, M) in inches. Defaults to (18, 7).
figsize.title: Figsize

show_zero_line.description: Whether or not to add a horizontal line at zero. Defaults to True.
show_zero_line.title: Show Zero Line

title.description: Title of the figure. Defaults to "Coherent Artifact".
title.title: Title

Defaults to 0 which means that the Oscillation plot at lowest spectral value will be shown.
spectral.title: Spectral

main_irf_nr.description: Index of the main ``irf`` component when using an ``irf`` parametrized with multiple peaks and is used to shift the time axis. If it is none ``None`` the shifting will be deactivated. Defaults to 0.
main_irf_nr.title: Main Irf Nr

normalize.description: Whether or not to normalize the DOAS spectra plot. If the DOAS spectra is normalized, the Oscillation is scaled with the reciprocal of the normalization to compensate for this. Defaults to False.
normalize.title: Normalize

figsize.description: Size of the figure (N, M) in inches. Defaults to (20, 5)
figsize.title: Figsize

show_zero_line.description: Whether or not to add a horizontal line at zero. Defaults to True
show_zero_line.title: Show Zero Line

oscillation_type.description: Type of the oscillation to show in the oscillation plot. Defaults to "cos"
oscillation_type.title: Oscillation Type

title.description: Title of the figure. Defaults to "Damped oscillations"
title.title: Title

legend_format_string.description: Format string for each entry in the legend of the oscillation plot. Possible values which can be replaced are ``label`` (label of the oscillation in the model definition), ``frequency`` (ν) and ``rate`` (γ). Use ``""`` to remove the legend. Defaults to ``r"{label}: $\nu$={frequency:.0f}, $\gamma$={rate:.1f}"``
legend_format_string.title: Legend Format String

PlotDoasKwargs.title: PlotDoasKwargs

PlotDoasConfig.description: Plot function configuration specific to ``plot_doas`` (overrides values in general).
PlotDoasConfig.title: PlotDoasConfig

PlotDataAndFitsKwargs.description: Default arguments to use for ``plot_data_and_fits``, if not specified in function call.

main_irf_nr.description: Index of the main ``irf`` component when using an ``irf`` parametrized with multiple peaks. Defaults to 0.
main_irf_nr.title: Main Irf Nr

linlog.description: Whether to use 'symlog' scale or not. Defaults to False.
linlog.title: Linlog

linthresh.description: A single float which defines the range (-x, x), within which the plot is linear. This avoids having the plot go to infinity around zero. Defaults to 1.
linthresh.title: Linthresh

divide_by_scale.description: Whether or not to divide the data by the dataset scale used for optimization. Defaults to True.
divide_by_scale.title: Divide By Scale

per_axis_legend.description: Whether to use a legend per plot or for the whole figure. Defaults to False.
per_axis_legend.title: Per Axis Legend

y_label.description: Label used for the y-axis of each subplot.
y_label.title: Y Label

show_zero_line.description: Whether or not to add a horizontal line at zero. Defaults to True.
show_zero_line.title: Show Zero Line

PlotDataAndFitsKwargs.title: PlotDataAndFitsKwargs

PlotDataAndFitsConfig.description: Plot function configuration specific to ``plot_data_and_fits`` (overrides values in general).
PlotDataAndFitsConfig.title: PlotDataAndFitsConfig

PlotFittedTracesKwargs.description: Default arguments to use for ``plot_fitted_traces``, if not specified in function call.

axes_shape.description: Shape of the plot grid (N, M). Defaults to (4, 4).
axes_shape.title: Axes Shape

center_λ.description: Center wavelength of the IRF (λ in nm).
center_λ.title: Center Λ

main_irf_nr.description: Index of the main ``irf`` component when using an ``irf`` parametrized with multiple peaks. Defaults to 0.
main_irf_nr.title: Main Irf Nr

linlog.description: Whether to use 'symlog' scale or not. Defaults to False.
linlog.title: Linlog

linthresh.description: A single float which defines the range (-x, x), within which the plot is linear. This avoids having the plot go to infinity around zero. Defaults to 1.
linthresh.title: Linthresh

divide_by_scale.description: Whether or not to divide the data by the dataset scale used for optimization. Defaults to True.
divide_by_scale.title: Divide By Scale

per_axis_legend.description: Whether to use a legend per plot or for the whole figure. Defaults to False.
per_axis_legend.title: Per Axis Legend

figsize.description: Size of the figure (N, M) in inches. Defaults to (30, 15).
figsize.title: Figsize

title.description: Title to add to the figure. Defaults to "Fit overview".
title.title: Title

y_label.description: Label used for the y-axis of each subplot.
y_label.title: Y Label

show_zero_line.description: Whether or not to add a horizontal line at zero. Defaults to True.
show_zero_line.title: Show Zero Line
